commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Over here!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Z-Zuraaaa! A field full of flowers!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It's spectacular!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I chanced upon it on my way back from greeting the mountain gods. Beauty has the power to restore the soul. Little demons, take in this gorgeous vista and heal thyself!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: This is amazing. If I took a nap here, I'd wake up with so much energy I wouldn't know what to do with it! I wish I could've seen this while I was still sleepy.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yeah, we already took a break.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Bwuh?! You did?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: The view is still beautiful even if we're not tired. Thank you for showing us this, Yoshiko. You still shouldn't have left without telling us, though.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I said I was sorry.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Well, since we've come all the way to this beautiful little spot, why don't we eat lunch here?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: That's a great idea. This field's so pretty, I can't imagine a more perfect place to have lunch.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: We still have to make our way back to the trail, so I suppose it would be a good idea to eat. Let's find a place to sit down.

commands.speaker: Umi, Eli, Hanamaru, Yoshiko, Kanata
commands.line: Time to eat!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Munch* *Munch* Mm-mmm! Rice balls, fried chicken, and rolled eggs! They're all so scrumptious, zura!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I really like the hint of spice you put in the burdock root.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: What a sinful flavor! I can't stop eating!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Everything is so colorful. Kanata, this is awesome. It must have been a ton of work to make all this.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: A little, I suppose. But when I thought about us all eating together, it wasn't hard at all.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I'm so glad we came hiking, zura. We got to enjoy this gorgeous view and share all this delicious food.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Even with the little troubles that popped up, today is a great day.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: This isn't a bad way to exercise, either. It's way different from dance practice or weight training. I might be up for another hike one of these days!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Really?! I'm so happy you feel that way! Actually, this ties into something I wanted to discuss with you all.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I was thinking we should go hiking on a regular basis! Perhaps we could even gradually shift from hiking to actual mountain climbing.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: We'll be refreshed, build lower body strength, and see sights like the field of flowers! It would do us all a lot of good. There's so much we can learn from the mountains.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: U-Uhh...

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: On a regular basis, zura?!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That could be, err, uhh, hmm...

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Oh, Umi.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Well? It's a great idea, isn't it? I hope you would all consider it!
